meaningMnemonic: My <kanji>instruction</kanji> is my <kanji>commandment</kanji>. You must do what I say in my instructions/commandments. This is my <vocabulary>warning</vocabulary>. This is my <vocabulary>admonition</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
